020import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;

025import java.lang.reflect.*;
026import java.nio.charset.*;

028import java.util.function.*;

042/**
043 * Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of {@link XmlParser}.
044 *
045 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
046 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
047 * </ul>
048 *
049 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
050 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/XmlBasics">XML Basics</a>
051
052 * </ul>
053 */
054@SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
055public class XmlParserSession extends ReaderParserSession {
056
057   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
058   // Static
059   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
060
061   private static final int UNKNOWN=0, OBJECT=1, ARRAY=2, STRING=3, NUMBER=4, BOOLEAN=5, NULL=6;
062
063   /**
064    * Creates a new builder for this object.
065    *
066    * @param ctx The context creating this session.
067    * @return A new builder.
068    */
069   public static Builder create(XmlParser ctx) {
070      return new Builder(ctx);
071   }
072
073   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
074   // Builder
075   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
076
077   /**
078    * Builder class.
079    */
080   @FluentSetters
081   public static class Builder extends ReaderParserSession.Builder {
082
083      XmlParser ctx;
084
085      /**
086       * Constructor
087       *
088       * @param ctx The context creating this session.
089       */
090      protected Builder(XmlParser ctx) {
091         super(ctx);
092         this.ctx = ctx;
093      }
094
095      @Override
096      public XmlParserSession build() {
097         return new XmlParserSession(this);
098      }
099
100      // <FluentSetters>
101
102      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
103      public <T> Builder apply(Class<T> type, Consumer<T> apply) {
104         super.apply(type, apply);
105         return this;
106      }
107
108      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
109      public Builder debug(Boolean value) {
110         super.debug(value);
111         return this;
112      }
113
114      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
115      public Builder properties(Map<String,Object> value) {
116         super.properties(value);
117         return this;
118      }
119
120      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
121      public Builder property(String key, Object value) {
122         super.property(key, value);
123         return this;
124      }
125
126      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.ContextSession.Builder */
127      public Builder unmodifiable() {
128         super.unmodifiable();
129         return this;
130      }
131
132      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
133      public Builder locale(Locale value) {
134         super.locale(value);
135         return this;
136      }
137
138      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
139      public Builder localeDefault(Locale value) {
140         super.localeDefault(value);
141         return this;
142      }
143
144      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
145      public Builder mediaType(MediaType value) {
146         super.mediaType(value);
147         return this;
148      }
149
150      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
151      public Builder mediaTypeDefault(MediaType value) {
152         super.mediaTypeDefault(value);
153         return this;
154      }
155
156      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
157      public Builder timeZone(TimeZone value) {
158         super.timeZone(value);
159         return this;
160      }
161
162      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanSession.Builder */
163      public Builder timeZoneDefault(TimeZone value) {
164         super.timeZoneDefault(value);
165         return this;
166      }
167
168      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
169      public Builder javaMethod(Method value) {
170         super.javaMethod(value);
171         return this;
172      }
173
174      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
175      public Builder outer(Object value) {
176         super.outer(value);
177         return this;
178      }
179
180      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
181      public Builder schema(HttpPartSchema value) {
182         super.schema(value);
183         return this;
184      }
185
186      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ParserSession.Builder */
187      public Builder schemaDefault(HttpPartSchema value) {
188         super.schemaDefault(value);
189         return this;
190      }
191
192      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ReaderParserSession.Builder */
193      public Builder fileCharset(Charset value) {
194         super.fileCharset(value);
195         return this;
196      }
197
198      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.parser.ReaderParserSession.Builder */
199      public Builder streamCharset(Charset value) {
200         super.streamCharset(value);
201         return this;
202      }
203
204      // </FluentSetters>
205   }
206
207   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
208   // Instance
209   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
210
211   private final XmlParser ctx;
212   private final StringBuilder rsb = new StringBuilder();  // Reusable string builder used in this class.
213
214   /**
215    * Constructor.
216    *
217    * @param builder The builder for this object.
218    */
219   protected XmlParserSession(Builder builder) {
220      super(builder);
221      ctx = builder.ctx;
222   }
223
224   /**
225    * Wrap the specified reader in a STAX reader based on settings in this context.
226    *
227    * @param pipe The parser input.
228    * @return The new STAX reader.
229    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
230    * @throws XMLStreamException Unexpected XML processing error.
231    */
232   protected final XmlReader getXmlReader(ParserPipe pipe) throws IOException, XMLStreamException {
233      return new XmlReader(pipe, isValidating(), getReporter(), getResolver(), getEventAllocator());
234   }
235
236   /**
237    * Decodes and trims the specified string.
238    *
239    * <p>
240    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
241    *
242    * @param s The string to be decoded.
243    * @return The decoded string.
244    */
245   protected final String decodeString(String s) {
246      if (s == null)
247         return null;
248      rsb.setLength(0);
249      s = XmlUtils.decode(s, rsb);
250      if (isTrimStrings())
251         s = s.trim();
252      return s;
253   }
254
255   /*
256    * Returns the name of the current XML element.
257    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
258    */
259   private String getElementName(XmlReader r) {
260      return decodeString(r.getLocalName());
261   }
262
263   /*
264    * Returns the _name attribute value.
265    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
266    */
267   private String getNameProperty(XmlReader r) {
268      return decodeString(r.getAttributeValue(null, getNamePropertyName()));
269   }
270
271   /*
272    * Returns the name of the specified attribute on the current XML element.
273    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
274    */
275   private String getAttributeName(XmlReader r, int i) {
276      return decodeString(r.getAttributeLocalName(i));
277   }
278
279   /*
280    * Returns the value of the specified attribute on the current XML element.
281    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
282    */
283   private String getAttributeValue(XmlReader r, int i) {
284      return decodeString(r.getAttributeValue(i));
285   }
286
287   /**
288    * Returns the text content of the current XML element.
289    *
290    * <p>
291    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
292    *
293    * <p>
294    * Leading and trailing whitespace (unencoded) will be trimmed from the result.
295    *
296    * @param r The reader to read the element text from.
297    * @return The decoded text.  <jk>null</jk> if the text consists of the sequence <js>'_x0000_'</js>.
298    * @throws XMLStreamException Thrown by underlying reader.
299    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
300    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
301    */
302   protected String getElementText(XmlReader r) throws XMLStreamException, IOException, ParseException {
303      return decodeString(r.getElementText().trim());
304   }
305
306   /*
307    * Returns the content of the current CHARACTERS node.
308    * Any <js>'_x####_'</js> sequences in the string will be decoded.
309    * Leading and trailing whitespace (unencoded) will be trimmed from the result.
310    */
311   private String getText(XmlReader r, boolean trim) {
312      String s = r.getText();
313      if (trim)
314         s = s.trim();
315      if (s.isEmpty())
316         return null;
317      return decodeString(s);
318   }
319
320   /*
321    * Shortcut for calling <code>getText(r, <jk>true</jk>);</code>.
322    */
323   private String getText(XmlReader r) {
324      return getText(r, true);
325   }
326
327   /*
328    * Takes the element being read from the XML stream reader and reconstructs it as XML.
329    * Used when reconstructing bean properties of type {@link XmlFormat#XMLTEXT}.
330    */
331   private String getElementAsString(XmlReader r) {
332      int t = r.getEventType();
333      if (t > 2)
334         throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid event type on stream reader for elementToString() method: ''{0}''", XmlUtils.toReadableEvent(r));
335      rsb.setLength(0);
336      rsb.append("<").append(t == 1 ? "" : "/").append(r.getLocalName());
337      if (t == 1)
338         for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++)
339            rsb.append(' ').append(r.getAttributeName(i)).append('=').append('\'').append(r.getAttributeValue(i)).append('\'');
340      rsb.append('>');
341      return rsb.toString();
342   }
343
344   /**
345    * Parses the current element as text.
346    *
347    * @param r The input reader.
348    * @return The parsed text.
349    * @throws XMLStreamException Thrown by underlying reader.
350    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
351    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
352    */
353   protected String parseText(XmlReader r) throws IOException, XMLStreamException, ParseException {
354      // Note that this is different than {@link #getText(XmlReader)} since it assumes that we're pointing to a
355      // whitespace element.
356
357      StringBuilder sb2 = getStringBuilder();
358
359      int depth = 0;
360      while (true) {
361         int et = r.getEventType();
362         if (et == START_ELEMENT) {
363            sb2.append(getElementAsString(r));
364            depth++;
365         } else if (et == CHARACTERS) {
366            sb2.append(getText(r));
367         } else if (et == END_ELEMENT) {
368            sb2.append(getElementAsString(r));
369            depth--;
370            if (depth <= 0)
371               break;
372         }
373         et = r.next();
374      }
375      String s = sb2.toString();
376      returnStringBuilder(sb2);
377      return s;
378   }
379
380   /**
381    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if the current element is a whitespace element.
382    *
383    * <p>
384    * For the XML parser, this always returns <jk>false</jk>.
385    * However, the HTML parser defines various whitespace elements such as <js>"br"</js> and <js>"sp"</js>.
386    *
387    * @param r The XML stream reader to read the current event from.
388    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the current element is a whitespace element.
389    */
390   protected boolean isWhitespaceElement(XmlReader r) {
391      return false;
392   }
393
394   /**
395    * Parses the current whitespace element.
396    *
397    * <p>
398    * For the XML parser, this always returns <jk>null</jk> since there is no concept of a whitespace element.
399    * However, the HTML parser defines various whitespace elements such as <js>"br"</js> and <js>"sp"</js>.
400    *
401    * @param r The XML stream reader to read the current event from.
402    * @return The whitespace character or characters.
403    * @throws XMLStreamException Thrown by underlying reader.
404    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
405    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
406    */
407   protected String parseWhitespaceElement(XmlReader r) throws IOException, XMLStreamException, ParseException {
408      return null;
409   }
410
411   @Override /* ParserSession */
412   protected <T> T doParse(ParserPipe pipe, ClassMeta<T> type) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException {
413      try {
414         return parseAnything(type, null, getXmlReader(pipe), getOuter(), true, null);
415      } catch (XMLStreamException e) {
416         throw new ParseException(e);
417      }
418   }
419
420   @Override /* ReaderParserSession */
421   protected <K,V> Map<K,V> doParseIntoMap(ParserPipe pipe, Map<K,V> m, Type keyType, Type valueType) throws Exception {
422      ClassMeta cm = getClassMeta(m.getClass(), keyType, valueType);
423      return parseIntoMap(pipe, m, cm.getKeyType(), cm.getValueType());
424   }
425
426   @Override /* ReaderParserSession */
427   protected <E> Collection<E> doParseIntoCollection(ParserPipe pipe, Collection<E> c, Type elementType) throws Exception {
428      ClassMeta cm = getClassMeta(c.getClass(), elementType);
429      return parseIntoCollection(pipe, c, cm.getElementType());
430   }
431
432   /**
433    * Workhorse method.
434    *
435    * @param <T> The expected type of object.
436    * @param eType The expected type of object.
437    * @param currAttr The current bean property name.
438    * @param r The reader.
439    * @param outer The outer object.
440    * @param isRoot If <jk>true</jk>, then we're serializing a root element in the document.
441    * @param pMeta The bean property metadata.
442    * @return The parsed object.
443    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
444    * @throws ParseException Malformed input encountered.
445    * @throws ExecutableException Exception occurred on invoked constructor/method/field.
446    * @throws XMLStreamException Malformed XML encountered.
447    */
448   protected <T> T parseAnything(ClassMeta<T> eType, String currAttr, XmlReader r,
449         Object outer, boolean isRoot, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
450
451      if (eType == null)
452         eType = (ClassMeta<T>)object();
453      ObjectSwap<T,Object> swap = (ObjectSwap<T,Object>)eType.getSwap(this);
454      BuilderSwap<T,Object> builder = (BuilderSwap<T,Object>)eType.getBuilderSwap(this);
455      ClassMeta<?> sType = null;
456      if (builder != null)
457         sType = builder.getBuilderClassMeta(this);
458      else if (swap != null)
459         sType = swap.getSwapClassMeta(this);
460      else
461         sType = eType;
462
463      if (sType.isOptional())
464         return (T)Utils.opt(parseAnything(eType.getElementType(), currAttr, r, outer, isRoot, pMeta));
465
466      setCurrentClass(sType);
467
468      String wrapperAttr = (isRoot && isPreserveRootElement()) ? r.getName().getLocalPart() : null;
469      String typeAttr = r.getAttributeValue(null, getBeanTypePropertyName(eType));
470      boolean isNil = "true".equals(r.getAttributeValue(null, "nil"));
471      int jsonType = getJsonType(typeAttr);
472      String elementName = getElementName(r);
473      if (jsonType == 0) {
474         if (elementName == null || elementName.equals(currAttr))
475            jsonType = UNKNOWN;
476         else {
477            typeAttr = elementName;
478            jsonType = getJsonType(elementName);
479         }
480      }
481
482      ClassMeta tcm = getClassMeta(typeAttr, pMeta, eType);
483      if (tcm == null && elementName != null && ! elementName.equals(currAttr))
484         tcm = getClassMeta(elementName, pMeta, eType);
485      if (tcm != null)
486         sType = eType = tcm;
487
488      Object o = null;
489
490      if (jsonType == NULL) {
491         r.nextTag();   // Discard end tag
492         return null;
493      }
494
495      if (sType.isObject()) {
496         if (jsonType == OBJECT) {
497            JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
498            parseIntoMap(r, m, string(), object(), pMeta);
499            if (wrapperAttr != null)
500               m = new JsonMap(this).append(wrapperAttr, m);
501            o = cast(m, pMeta, eType);
502         } else if (jsonType == ARRAY)
503            o = parseIntoCollection(r, new JsonList(this), null, pMeta);
504         else if (jsonType == STRING) {
505            o = getElementText(r);
506            if (sType.isChar())
507               o = parseCharacter(o);
508         }
509         else if (jsonType == NUMBER)
510            o = parseNumber(getElementText(r), null);
511         else if (jsonType == BOOLEAN)
512            o = Boolean.parseBoolean(getElementText(r));
513         else if (jsonType == UNKNOWN)
514            o = getUnknown(r);
515      } else if (sType.isBoolean()) {
516         o = Boolean.parseBoolean(getElementText(r));
517      } else if (sType.isCharSequence()) {
518         o = getElementText(r);
519      } else if (sType.isChar()) {
520         o = parseCharacter(getElementText(r));
521      } else if (sType.isMap()) {
522         Map m = (sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer) ? (Map)sType.newInstance(outer) : newGenericMap(sType));
523         o = parseIntoMap(r, m, sType.getKeyType(), sType.getValueType(), pMeta);
524         if (wrapperAttr != null)
525            o = new JsonMap(this).append(wrapperAttr, m);
526      } else if (sType.isCollection()) {
527         Collection l = (sType.canCreateNewInstance(outer) ? (Collection)sType.newInstance(outer) : new JsonList(this));
528         o = parseIntoCollection(r, l, sType, pMeta);
529      } else if (sType.isNumber()) {
530         o = parseNumber(getElementText(r), (Class<? extends Number>)sType.getInnerClass());
531      } else if (builder != null || sType.canCreateNewBean(outer)) {
532         if (getXmlClassMeta(sType).getFormat() == COLLAPSED) {
533            String fieldName = r.getLocalName();
534            BeanMap<?> m = builder != null ? toBeanMap(builder.create(this, eType)) : newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass());
535            BeanPropertyMeta bpm = getXmlBeanMeta(m.getMeta()).getPropertyMeta(fieldName);
536            ClassMeta<?> cm = m.getMeta().getClassMeta();
537            Object value = parseAnything(cm, currAttr, r, m.getBean(false), false, null);
538            setName(cm, value, currAttr);
539            bpm.set(m, currAttr, value);
540            o = builder != null ? builder.build(this, m.getBean(), eType) : m.getBean();
541         } else {
542            BeanMap m = builder != null ? toBeanMap(builder.create(this, eType)) : newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass());
543            m = parseIntoBean(r, m, isNil);
544            o = builder != null ? builder.build(this, m.getBean(), eType) : m.getBean();
545         }
546      } else if (sType.isArray() || sType.isArgs()) {
547         ArrayList l = (ArrayList)parseIntoCollection(r, list(), sType, pMeta);
548         o = toArray(sType, l);
549      } else if (sType.canCreateNewInstanceFromString(outer)) {
550         o = sType.newInstanceFromString(outer, getElementText(r));
551      } else if (sType.getProxyInvocationHandler() != null) {
552         JsonMap m = new JsonMap(this);
553         parseIntoMap(r, m, string(), object(), pMeta);
554         if (wrapperAttr != null)
555            m = new JsonMap(this).append(wrapperAttr, m);
556         o = newBeanMap(outer, sType.getInnerClass()).load(m).getBean();
557      } else {
558         throw new ParseException(this,
559            "Class ''{0}'' could not be instantiated.  Reason: ''{1}'', property: ''{2}''",
560            sType.getInnerClass().getName(), sType.getNotABeanReason(), pMeta == null ? null : pMeta.getName());
561      }
562
563      if (swap != null && o != null)
564         o = unswap(swap, o, eType);
565
566      if (outer != null)
567         setParent(eType, o, outer);
568
569      return (T)o;
570   }
571
572   private <K,V> Map<K,V> parseIntoMap(XmlReader r, Map<K,V> m, ClassMeta<K> keyType,
573         ClassMeta<V> valueType, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
574      int depth = 0;
575      for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++) {
576         String a = r.getAttributeLocalName(i);
577         // TODO - Need better handling of namespaces here.
578         if (! isSpecialAttr(a)) {
579            K key = trim(convertAttrToType(m, a, keyType));
580            V value = trim(convertAttrToType(m, r.getAttributeValue(i), valueType));
581            setName(valueType, value, key);
582            m.put(key, value);
583         }
584      }
585      do {
586         int event = r.nextTag();
587         String currAttr;
588         if (event == START_ELEMENT) {
589            depth++;
590            currAttr = getNameProperty(r);
591            if (currAttr == null)
592               currAttr = getElementName(r);
593            K key = convertAttrToType(m, currAttr, keyType);
594            V value = parseAnything(valueType, currAttr, r, m, false, pMeta);
595            setName(valueType, value, currAttr);
596            if (valueType.isObject() && m.containsKey(key)) {
597               Object o = m.get(key);
598               if (o instanceof List)
599                  ((List)o).add(value);
600               else
601                  m.put(key, (V)new JsonList(o, value).setBeanSession(this));
602            } else {
603               m.put(key, value);
604            }
605         } else if (event == END_ELEMENT) {
606            depth--;
607            return m;
608         }
609      } while (depth > 0);
610      return m;
611   }
612
613   private <E> Collection<E> parseIntoCollection(XmlReader r, Collection<E> l,
614         ClassMeta<?> type, BeanPropertyMeta pMeta) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
615      int depth = 0;
616      int argIndex = 0;
617      do {
618         int event = r.nextTag();
619         if (event == START_ELEMENT) {
620            depth++;
621            ClassMeta<?> elementType = type == null ? object() : type.isArgs() ? type.getArg(argIndex++) : type.getElementType();
622            E value = (E)parseAnything(elementType, null, r, l, false, pMeta);
623            l.add(value);
624         } else if (event == END_ELEMENT) {
625            depth--;
626            return l;
627         }
628      } while (depth > 0);
629      return l;
630   }
631
632   private static int getJsonType(String s) {
633      if (s == null)
634         return UNKNOWN;
635      char c = s.charAt(0);
636      switch(c) {
637         case 'o': return (s.equals("object") ? OBJECT : UNKNOWN);
638         case 'a': return (s.equals("array") ? ARRAY : UNKNOWN);
639         case 's': return (s.equals("string") ? STRING : UNKNOWN);
640         case 'b': return (s.equals("boolean") ? BOOLEAN : UNKNOWN);
641         case 'n': {
642            c = s.charAt(2);
643            switch(c) {
644               case 'm': return (s.equals("number") ? NUMBER : UNKNOWN);
645               case 'l': return (s.equals("null") ? NULL : UNKNOWN);
646            }
647            //return NUMBER;
648         }
649      }
650      return UNKNOWN;
651   }
652
653   private <T> BeanMap<T> parseIntoBean(XmlReader r, BeanMap<T> m, boolean isNil) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
654      BeanMeta<?> bMeta = m.getMeta();
655      XmlBeanMeta xmlMeta = getXmlBeanMeta(bMeta);
656
657      for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++) {
658         String key = getAttributeName(r, i);
659         if (! ("nil".equals(key) || isSpecialAttr(key))) {
660            String val = r.getAttributeValue(i);
661            String ns = r.getAttributeNamespace(i);
662            BeanPropertyMeta bpm = xmlMeta.getPropertyMeta(key);
663            if (bpm == null) {
664               if (xmlMeta.getAttrsProperty() != null) {
665                  xmlMeta.getAttrsProperty().add(m, key, key, val);
666               } else if (ns == null) {
667                  onUnknownProperty(key, m, val);
668               }
669            } else {
670               try {
671                  bpm.set(m, key, val);
672               } catch (BeanRuntimeException e) {
673                  onBeanSetterException(bpm, e);
674                  throw e;
675               }
676            }
677         }
678      }
679
680      BeanPropertyMeta cp = xmlMeta.getContentProperty();
681      XmlFormat cpf = xmlMeta.getContentFormat();
682      boolean trim = cp == null || ! cpf.isOneOf(MIXED_PWS, TEXT_PWS);
683      ClassMeta<?> cpcm = (cp == null ? object() : cp.getClassMeta());
684      StringBuilder sb = null;
685      BeanRegistry breg = cp == null ? null : cp.getBeanRegistry();
686      LinkedList<Object> l = null;
687
688      int depth = 0;
689      do {
690         int event = r.next();
691         String currAttr;
692         // We only care about text in MIXED mode.
693         // Ignore if in ELEMENTS mode.
694         if (event == CHARACTERS) {
695            if (cp != null && cpf.isOneOf(MIXED, MIXED_PWS)) {
696               if (cpcm.isCollectionOrArray()) {
697                  if (l == null)
698                     l = new LinkedList<>();
699                  l.add(getText(r, false));
700               } else {
701                  cp.set(m, null, getText(r, trim));
702               }
703            } else if (cpf != ELEMENTS) {
704               String s = getText(r, trim);
705               if (s != null) {
706                  if (sb == null)
707                     sb = getStringBuilder();
708                  sb.append(s);
709               }
710            } else {
711               // Do nothing...we're in ELEMENTS mode.
712            }
713         } else if (event == START_ELEMENT) {
714            if (cp != null && cpf.isOneOf(TEXT, TEXT_PWS)) {
715               String s = parseText(r);
716               if (s != null) {
717                  if (sb == null)
718                     sb = getStringBuilder();
719                  sb.append(s);
720               }
721               depth--;
722            } else if (cpf == XMLTEXT) {
723               if (sb == null)
724                  sb = getStringBuilder();
725               sb.append(getElementAsString(r));
726               depth++;
727            } else if (cp != null && cpf.isOneOf(MIXED, MIXED_PWS)) {
728               if (isWhitespaceElement(r) && (breg == null || ! breg.hasName(r.getLocalName()))) {
729                  if (cpcm.isCollectionOrArray()) {
730                     if (l == null)
731                        l = new LinkedList<>();
732                     l.add(parseWhitespaceElement(r));
733                  } else {
734                     cp.set(m, null, parseWhitespaceElement(r));
735                  }
736               } else {
737                  if (cpcm.isCollectionOrArray()) {
738                     if (l == null)
739                        l = new LinkedList<>();
740                     l.add(parseAnything(cpcm.getElementType(), cp.getName(), r, m.getBean(false), false, cp));
741                  } else {
742                     cp.set(m, null, parseAnything(cpcm, cp.getName(), r, m.getBean(false), false, cp));
743                  }
744               }
745            } else if (cp != null && cpf == ELEMENTS) {
746               cp.add(m, null, parseAnything(cpcm.getElementType(), cp.getName(), r, m.getBean(false), false, cp));
747            } else {
748               currAttr = getNameProperty(r);
749               if (currAttr == null)
750                  currAttr = getElementName(r);
751               BeanPropertyMeta pMeta = xmlMeta.getPropertyMeta(currAttr);
752               if (pMeta == null) {
753                  Object value = parseAnything(object(), currAttr, r, m.getBean(false), false, null);
754                  onUnknownProperty(currAttr, m, value);
755               } else {
756                  setCurrentProperty(pMeta);
757                  XmlFormat xf = getXmlBeanPropertyMeta(pMeta).getXmlFormat();
758                  if (xf == COLLAPSED) {
759                     ClassMeta<?> et = pMeta.getClassMeta().getElementType();
760                     Object value = parseAnything(et, currAttr, r, m.getBean(false), false, pMeta);
761                     setName(et, value, currAttr);
762                     pMeta.add(m, currAttr, value);
763                  } else if (xf == ATTR)  {
764                     pMeta.set(m, currAttr, getAttributeValue(r, 0));
765                     r.nextTag();
766                  } else {
767                     ClassMeta<?> cm = pMeta.getClassMeta();
768                     Object value = parseAnything(cm, currAttr, r, m.getBean(false), false, pMeta);
769                     setName(cm, value, currAttr);
770                     pMeta.set(m, currAttr, value);
771                  }
772                  setCurrentProperty(null);
773               }
774            }
775         } else if (event == END_ELEMENT) {
776            if (depth > 0) {
777               if (cpf == XMLTEXT) {
778                  if (sb == null)
779                     sb = getStringBuilder();
780                  sb.append(getElementAsString(r));
781               }
782               else
783                  throw new ParseException("End element found where one was not expected.  {0}", XmlUtils.toReadableEvent(r));
784            }
785            depth--;
786         } else if (event == COMMENT) {
787            // Ignore comments.
788         } else {
789            throw new ParseException("Unexpected event type: {0}", XmlUtils.toReadableEvent(r));
790         }
791      } while (depth >= 0);
792
793      if (cp != null && ! isNil) {
794         if (sb != null)
795            cp.set(m, null, sb.toString());
796         else if (l != null)
797            cp.set(m, null, XmlUtils.collapseTextNodes(l));
798         else if (cpcm.isCollectionOrArray()) {
799            Object o = cp.get(m, null);
800            if (o == null)
801               cp.set(m, cp.getName(), list());
802         }
803      }
804
805      returnStringBuilder(sb);
806      return m;
807   }
808
809   private boolean isSpecialAttr(String key) {
810      return key.equals(getBeanTypePropertyName(null)) || key.equals(getNamePropertyName());
811   }
812
813   private Object getUnknown(XmlReader r) throws IOException, ParseException, ExecutableException, XMLStreamException {
814      if (r.getEventType() != START_ELEMENT) {
815         throw new ParseException(this, "Parser must be on START_ELEMENT to read next text.");
816      }
817      JsonMap m = null;
818
819      // If this element has attributes, then it's always a JsonMap.
820      if (r.getAttributeCount() > 0) {
821         m = new JsonMap(this);
822         for (int i = 0; i < r.getAttributeCount(); i++) {
823            String key = getAttributeName(r, i);
824            String val = r.getAttributeValue(i);
825            if (! isSpecialAttr(key))
826               m.put(key, val);
827         }
828      }
829      int eventType = r.next();
830      StringBuilder sb = getStringBuilder();
831      while (eventType != END_ELEMENT) {
832         if (eventType == CHARACTERS || eventType == CDATA || eventType == SPACE || eventType == ENTITY_REFERENCE) {
833            sb.append(r.getText());
834         } else if (eventType == PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION || eventType == COMMENT) {
835            // skipping
836         } else if (eventType == END_DOCUMENT) {
837            throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected end of document when reading element text content");
838         } else if (eventType == START_ELEMENT) {
839            // Oops...this has an element in it.
840            // Parse it as a map.
841            if (m == null)
842               m = new JsonMap(this);
843            int depth = 0;
844            do {
845               int event = (eventType == -1 ? r.nextTag() : eventType);
846               String currAttr;
847               if (event == START_ELEMENT) {
848                  depth++;
849                  currAttr = getNameProperty(r);
850                  if (currAttr == null)
851                     currAttr = getElementName(r);
852                  String key = convertAttrToType(null, currAttr, string());
853                  Object value = parseAnything(object(), currAttr, r, null, false, null);
854                  if (m.containsKey(key)) {
855                     Object o = m.get(key);
856                     if (o instanceof JsonList)
857                        ((JsonList)o).add(value);
858                     else
859                        m.put(key, new JsonList(o, value).setBeanSession(this));
860                  } else {
861                     m.put(key, value);
862                  }
863
864               } else if (event == END_ELEMENT) {
865                  depth--;
866                  break;
867               }
868               eventType = -1;
869            } while (depth > 0);
870            break;
871         } else {
872            throw new ParseException(this, "Unexpected event type ''{0}''", eventType);
873         }
874         eventType = r.next();
875      }
876      String s = sb.toString().trim();
877      returnStringBuilder(sb);
878      s = decodeString(s);
879      if (m != null) {
880         if (! s.isEmpty())
881            m.put("contents", s);
882         return m;
883      }
884      return s;
885   }
886
887   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
888   // Properties
889   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
890
891   /**
892    * XML event allocator.
893    *
894    * @see XmlParser.Builder#eventAllocator(Class)
895    * @return
896    *    The {@link XMLEventAllocator} associated with this parser, or <jk>null</jk> if there isn't one.
897    */
898   protected final XMLEventAllocator getEventAllocator() {
899      return ctx.getEventAllocator();
900   }
901
902   /**
903    * Preserve root element during generalized parsing.
904    *
905    * @see XmlParser.Builder#preserveRootElement()
906    * @return
907    *    <jk>true</jk> if when parsing into a generic {@link JsonMap}, the map will contain a single entry whose key
908    *    is the root element name.
909    */
910   protected final boolean isPreserveRootElement() {
911      return ctx.isPreserveRootElement();
912   }
913
914   /**
915    * XML reporter.
916    *
917    * @see XmlParser.Builder#reporter(Class)
918    * @return
919    *    The {@link XMLReporter} associated with this parser, or <jk>null</jk> if there isn't one.
920    */
921   protected final XMLReporter getReporter() {
922      return ctx.getReporter();
923   }
924
925   /**
926    * XML resolver.
927    *
928    * @see XmlParser.Builder#resolver(Class)
929    * @return
930    *    The {@link XMLResolver} associated with this parser, or <jk>null</jk> if there isn't one.
931    */
932   protected final XMLResolver getResolver() {
933      return ctx.getResolver();
934   }
935
936   /**
937    * Enable validation.
938    *
939    * @see XmlParser.Builder#validating()
940    * @return
941    *    <jk>true</jk> if XML document will be validated.
942    */
943   protected final boolean isValidating() {
944      return ctx.isValidating();
945   }
946
947   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
948   // Extended metadata
949   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
950
951   /**
952    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified class.
953    *
954    * @param cm The class to return the metadata on.
955    * @return The metadata.
956    */
957   protected XmlClassMeta getXmlClassMeta(ClassMeta<?> cm) {
958      return ctx.getXmlClassMeta(cm);
959   }
960
961   /**
962    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified bean.
963    *
964    * @param bm The bean to return the metadata on.
965    * @return The metadata.
966    */
967   protected XmlBeanMeta getXmlBeanMeta(BeanMeta<?> bm) {
968      return ctx.getXmlBeanMeta(bm);
969   }
970
971   /**
972    * Returns the language-specific metadata on the specified bean property.
973    *
974    * @param bpm The bean property to return the metadata on.
975    * @return The metadata.
976    */
977   protected XmlBeanPropertyMeta getXmlBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm) {
978      return ctx.getXmlBeanPropertyMeta(bpm);
979   }
980}
